snippet.title: Mega-CD Longplay [053] Jurassic Park
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by:  MadMatty

As an adventure game it seems short, but actually playing it takes far longer as there are not any real clues as to where to go next. Needed objects are generaly on chosen path but its not always obvious where to use them.

The game takes place after the first movie, but if there was one game that could have benefited from some movie fmv, it would have been this one just to tie it in with the movie.

There are plenty of places to die but there are no death cinematics apart from one forced game ending which I left in.

Stage 1 - 02:10 - Dilophosaurus and Gallimimus
Stage 2 - 19:50 - Triceratops and Brachiosauraus
Stage 3 - 42:35 - Tyrannosaurus Rex
Stage 4 - 51:20 - Velociraptors and Compy.
Stage 5 - 60:40 - Escape the Island -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
